alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 16 at 8:04PM EDT until May 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM EDT WEDNESDAY FOR SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... The National Weather Service in Upton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 8 AM to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fairfield, New Haven, Middlesex, and New London. * TIMING...From late morning into the early evening hours on Wednesday. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 60. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Rapid fire spread if ignition occurs.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected or occurring. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create a significantly elevated fire growth potential.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
